about.title: / About Me
about.beyond_p1: My expertise lies in creating what is unseen: server architecture, database management, and API performance.
about.beyond_p2: I am not just an executor, I am an architect. I love solving complex problems and building solid foundations upon which modern frontend interfaces can rely.

contact.desc: I am always looking for ambitious technical challenges, particularly on complex backend architectures.
